titles.title: Elimination of Single Parent Tax Act of 2008
Elimination of Single Parent Tax Act of 2008
To amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit States from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Elimination of Single Parent Tax Act of 2008 - Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit states from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.
